pvoice_ch0021_00_green/system001:
Hey, I’m Blue! Whenever I see a strong Trainer,
I just have to battle them. Nice to meet you!
pvoice_ch0006_00_oba/system001:
The name’s Flint! I’m one of the Sinnoh
Pokémon League’s Elite Four!
And let me tell ya, my heart’s always on fire!
pvoice_ch0008_00_erika/system001: My name is Erika. Nice to meet you.
pvoice_ch0013_00_hapu/system001:
I am Hapu, kahuna of Poni Island!
I will fight with every fiber of my being!
pvoice_ch0016_00_huuro/system001:
Hi, I’m Skyla, the high-flying girl!
Whether you want to fly or blow your
opponents away, you can count on me!
pvoice_ch0029_00_asuna/system001:
I’m Flannery!
I’m, uh, honored to be serving as a Fire-type
Gym Leader... No, I mean...I’m in charge!
pvoice_ch0101_00_mei/system001:
Nice to meet you! My name’s Rosa!
I hope we can be friends!
pvoice_ch0099_00_jun/system001:
Hey! I’m Barry, from Twinleaf Town!
And if you’re like, “Where’s that?”
I’m fining you ten million!
pvoice_ch0015_00_takeshi/system001:
My name’s Brock. I’m a Gym Leader.
When it comes to rock-hard willpower,
nobody can beat me!
pvoice_ch0010_00_maximum/system001:
I’m Crasher Wake!
I’m a Water-type Gym Leader!
Think you can take me on?!
pvoice_ch0011_00_homika/system001:
Hey, I’m Roxie!
Whether it’s in my band or in battle,
I’ll always give it my all!
pvoice_ch0023_00_momi/system001:
Hello, my name’s Cheryl.
I’m a Pokémon Trainer.
It’s nice to meet you!
pvoice_ch0024_00_shikimi/system001:
I’m Shauntal, a Ghost-type Pokémon Trainer.
I am both a writer and a member of the
Unova Elite Four.
pvoice_ch0026_00_akane/system001:
My name’s Whitney, and I’m a Gym Leader!
Ain’t I a cutie?!
Try not to get too infatuated!
pvoice_ch0030_00_ran/system001:
Hehe! I’m Liza, a Psychic-type
Pokémon Trainer! And I’m a twin!
My brother and I are Gym Leaders.
pvoice_ch0033_00_yakon/system001:
The name’s Clay.
I’m the Gym Leader o’ Driftveil City Gym!
Time to get to work!
pvoice_ch0035_00_matthies/system001:
The name’s Surge!
I’m the lightning lieutenant who battles with
Electric-type Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0036_00_mamane/system001:
I-I’m Sophocles...
One of the captains of Ula’ula Island.
pvoice_ch0037_00_fukuji/system001:
Ho ho! The name’s Ramos. I may not look it,
but I’m a Grass-type Gym Leader.
If yeh want to know about plants, I’m yer man!
pvoice_ch0040_00_hachiku/system001:
I am Brycen.
I’m known as the Ice Mask!
pvoice_ch0043_00_toki/system001:
Hey, I’m Brawly, the next big wave in training
and the leader of Dewford City’s Gym!
Nice to meet you!
pvoice_ch0057_00_shiba/system001:
I am Bruno, of the Indigo Elite Four!
My Pokémon and I always train to the extreme!
pvoice_ch0063_00_renbu/system001:
My name is Marshal, Elite Four member and
Master Alder’s apprentice! I will achieve
true strength with my training!
pvoice_ch0094_00_genji/system001:
I am Drake, of the Hoenn Elite Four!
Let me see if you truly know 
what it takes to be a Trainer!
pvoice_ch0097_00_mai/system001:
H-hi, I’m Marley. I’m looking forward to
spending some time with you.
pvoice_ch0002_00_kotone/system001:
Nice to meet you. I’m Lyra!
I’ve spent a lot of time exploring 
with my Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0005_00_kanna/system001:
I am the Ice-type Pokémon Trainer Lorelei.
I wonder, will you be able to make me feel 
the heat of battle?
pvoice_ch0018_00_chris/system001:
Heya, I’m Kris!
I’ve got a lot of confidence in my knowledge
of Pokémon! Feel free to ask me anything!
pvoice_ch0019_00_yuki/system001:
My name’s Brendan.
I’m a Trainer from the Hoenn region!
I know a lot about Pokémon, so leave it to me!
pvoice_ch0020_00_toya/system001:
Hi! I’m Hilbert! I’m really looking forward to 
team battles alongside you. Let’s be friends!
pvoice_ch0022_00_urup/system001:
You know who I am? 
I’m Wulfric, the Gym Leader of Snowbelle City.
pvoice_ch0025_00_suzuna/system001:
Hi, I’m Candice, the Gym Leader of an
Ice-type Gym! I’ll show you how super
focused I am, so you better be ready!
pvoice_ch0027_00_natane/system001:
Hi! I’m Gardenia! I’m the master of vivid plant
Pokémon and a Grass-type Gym Leader!
pvoice_ch0031_00_fuu/system001:
I’m Tate! And I’m a twin!
My sister and I are Gym Leaders.
Don’t hear that every day, do you?
pvoice_ch0034_00_matsurika/system001:
Heyyy, you and your Pokémon
would make a real pretty painting.
Oh, by the way, my name’s Mina.
pvoice_ch0038_00_hyouta/system001:
I’m Roark, a Gym Leader! 
Work hard and be as strong as a Rock-type 
Pokémon. That’s my motto.
pvoice_ch0041_00_nejiki/system001:
I’m Factory Head Thorton.
Pleasure to meet me. Just so you know,
my Pokémon knowledge is unbeatable.
pvoice_ch0042_00_nagi/system001:
I am Winona, a Gym Leader.
I am known as the bird Pokémon
user who soars throughout the world.
pvoice_ch0044_00_tsutsuji/system001:
Hello! I’m Roxanne.
I like to strategize before a battle. That means
applying everything I’ve studied up till now.
pvoice_ch0045_00_tsukushi/system001:
I’m Bugsy! You may know me as the Azalea
Town Gym Leader in the Johto region—or maybe
as the Walking Bug Pokémon Encyclopedia!
pvoice_ch0046_00_datsura/system001:
The name’s Noland! I’m the Frontier Brain 
in charge of the Battle Factory over in Hoenn. 
Pleasure to meet you!
pvoice_ch0047_00_itsuki/system001:
I’m Will, of Indigo Elite Four fame.
I’m here to show the world the
true ferocity of my psychic powers!
pvoice_ch0049_00_fuyo/system001:
Haha! I’m Phoebe, of the Hoenn Elite Four.
My Pokémon and I share an unbreakable bond!
pvoice_ch0050_00_sumomo/system001:
Hi! My name’s Maylene. 
I’ll accept a challenge anytime, anywhere!
pvoice_ch0051_00_litchi/system001:
I’m Olivia, the kahuna of Akala Island.
Get ready for your hardest Pokémon battle yet!
pvoice_ch0052_00_shizui/system001:
’Sup! The name’s Marlon, man of the sea!
We should totally go for a swim sometime, dude!
pvoice_ch0053_00_zakuro/system001:
My name’s Grant.
I’m the Cyllage City Gym Leader back in Kalos.
I climb any wall in front of me!
pvoice_ch0055_00_gampi/system001:
I am Wikstrom, the famed steel blade
of the Kalos Elite Four!
pvoice_ch0058_00_kahiri/system001:
My name’s Kahili. I’m a member of the Alola
Elite Four and also a professional golfer!
pvoice_ch0059_00_katsura/system001:
Heh! I’m Blaine, the leader of Cinnabar Gym!
People know me as the hotheaded quiz master!
pvoice_ch0060_00_anzu/system001:
Janine of Fuchsia Gym—that’s me!
I’m a ninja Pokémon Trainer and
master of all things poison!
pvoice_ch0061_00_kikuko/system001:
I’m Agatha, of the Indigo Elite Four!
Let’s see what you can do, child!
pvoice_ch0062_00_karin/system001:
I’m Karen, of the Indigo Elite Four.
I hope you can at least provide me
a bit of entertainment.
pvoice_ch0096_00_zumi/system001:
I am Siebold, of the Kalos Elite Four.
Tell me—don’t you think Pokémon battles
are worthy of being called art?
pvoice_ch0012_00_corni/system001:
Time for Lady Korrina’s grand appearance!
Just teasing! Nice to meet you!
pvoice_ch0009_00_senri/system001:
My name is Norman.
I’m a Gym Leader from the Hoenn region.
I’ll be counting on you from here on out.
pvoice_ch0032_00_yanagi/system001:
My name is Pryce. I’m a Gym Leader.
I have forged my path through life with
Ice-type Pokémon by my side.
pvoice_ch0092_00_iris/system001:
Hi! I’m Iris!
People call me the girl who
knows the hearts of dragons!
pvoice_ch0015_01_takeshi/system001:
I feel like I’m on fire in this outfit!
It just oozes strength, don’t you think?
I’m ready for any battle. You can count on me!
pvoice_ch0098_00_hau/system001:
Hey, I’m Hau. Nice to meet you!
I’m from Melemele Island, and my
old gramps is the kahuna there!
pvoice_ch0028_00_ibuki/system001: I am Clair, the world’s best Dragon-type master.
pvoice_ch0039_00_viola/system001:
I’m Viola! We’re going to snag 
some picturesque victories—I promise!
pvoice_ch0054_00_kyo/system001:
I am Koga, of the Indigo Elite Four!
I live in shadows.
You will be safe in my company!
pvoice_ch0056_00_kuchinashi/system001:
I’m an island kahuna, you know? From Alola.
Oh, and the name’s Nanu.
pvoice_ch0007_00_acerola/system001:
Hiya, I’m Acerola! I’m a member of the Alola
Elite Four, bringing an old royal touch to Pasio!
pvoice_ch0014_01_cheren/system001:
My name’s Cheren!
I’m a Gym Leader and a teacher!
Pleasure to meet you.
pvoice_ch0110_01_kasumi/system001:
Have you heard of the Kanto Gym Leader they
call the Tomboyish Mermaid? That’s me, Misty!
pvoice_ch0004_00_toko/system001:
I’m Hilda! When it comes to Pokémon battles, 
you can count on me!
Trust me, I’m really good at this stuff!
pvoice_ch0106_00_kamitsure/system001:
My name is Elesa. I’m a Gym Leader—and
a model. Basically, I turn people’s dreams
into reality.
pvoice_ch0095_00_cattleya/system001:
I am Caitlin, of the Unova Elite Four. Perhaps
here I can have the superb battles I seek.
pvoice_ch0153_00_prim/system001:
My name is Glacia, of the Hoenn Elite Four.
I’ve travelled to Pasio to hone my
Ice-type moves.
pvoice_ch0003_00_calme/system001:
Hi, I’m Calem, from the Kalos region. How about
we compete to see who ends up stronger?
pvoice_ch0048_00_gima/system001:
Call me Grimsley. I guess you could say 
I’m a bit of a risk taker. I live for battles!
That’s my destiny.
pvoice_ch0140_00_sakaki/system001:
The ultimate goal of Team Rocket is
to use Pokémon to rule the world. 
I, Giovanni, am its leader!
pvoice_ch0091_00_shirona/system001:
I’m Cynthia, Champion of the
Sinnoh Pokémon League.
I study Pokémon mythology.
pvoice_ch0111_00_wataru/system001:
You can call me Lance, the dragon master!
Something tells me the two of us are going
to make a first-class team.
pvoice_ch0101_00_mei/system011:
It’s great to see you again!
I’m excited to help you out some more!
pvoice_ch0096_00_zumi/system011:
Devotion to one’s craft leads to delightful
results—in fine cuisine and in Pokémon training.
pvoice_ch0017_00_leaf/system001:
Nice to meet you! I’m Leaf! Let’s explore
our Pokémon’s potential together!
pvoice_ch0112_00_hibiki/system001:
Hey, I’m Ethan! I’m always down for a fun
new adventure. I love Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0001_00_kukui/system001:
Hey there, cousin! I’m Kukui—a
Pokémon Professor researching moves.
So of course I love Pokémon battles! Oh yeah!
pvoice_ch0090_00_daigo/system001:
Hello! I’m Steven. I’m interested in rare
stones, so I travel here and there.
pvoice_ch0129_00_higana/system001:
I’m Zinnia—just a traveling Pokémon Trainer,
dreaming of taking a little trip into space...
Heh.
pvoice_ch0114_00_natsume/system001:
I’m Sabrina. I discovered my psychic powers
as a child when I accidentally bent a spoon
with my mind...
pvoice_ch0151_00_melissa/system001:
I am Fantina! I wish to show you Pokémon
battling à la danse classique!
pvoice_ch0106_10_kamitsure/system001:
This outfit was tailor-made just for me—
one of a kind! Bet it’s gonna make things
way more fun!
pvoice_ch0157_00_mache/system001:
I’m Valerie, a Fairy-type Gym Leader.
The elusive fairy may appear delicate as
a bloom, but it is strong.
pvoice_ch0137_00_orchid1/system001:
Hello there!
My name is Oak, but most people refer
to me as the Pokémon Professor.
pvoice_ch0125_00_guzma/system001:
Wanna see what destruction looks like?
Here it is in human form—
it’s your boy Guzma!
pvoice_ch0121_00_plumeria/system001:
I’m Plumeria. I help keep Team Skull
together. Basically, I’m like a big sister
to a bunch of lovable numskulls.
pvoice_ch0131_00_citron/system001:
The name’s Clemont!
I like my Pokémon battles how I like my
inventions—high-voltage!
pvoice_ch0113_00_mikan/system001:
I’m Jasmine, a Gym Leader.
I use the...clang! Steel type!
pvoice_ch0128_00_mitsuru/system001:
N-nice to meet you! I’m Wally.
My Pokémon and I are always moving
forward together, little by little, day by day!
pvoice_ch0127_00_mikuri/system001:
My name is Wallace. Sit back and fully
absorb the brilliance of my aquatic illusions!
pvoice_ch0155_00_dracaena/system001:
Hello to you! I’m Drasna, one of the Kalos
Elite Four. You and your Pokémon are
simply charming!
pvoice_ch0133_00_shilver/system001:
My name’s Silver. I’m going to be the
world’s greatest Pokémon Trainer.
pvoice_ch0116_00_hikari/system001:
Hi, I’m Dawn. I’ve got a bit more experience
as a Trainer than you, so I can teach you
some things!
pvoice_ch0170_00_arty/system001:
Oh, hellooo! I’m Burgh. I love creating
works of art that showcase the beauty
of Bug-type Pokémon.
pvoice_ch0048_10_gima/system001:
To risk it all...just one Trainer and one
Pokémon... It’s like candy for a thrill seeker
like me.
pvoice_ch0130_00_serena/system001:
Hi there! My name’s Serena. I turn my
friendship with my Pokémon into
pure strength!
pvoice_ch0148_00_matsuba/system001:
My name’s Morty. I’m Ecruteak’s Gym
Leader. Say, do you want to be part of
my training?
pvoice_ch0198_00_azami/system001:
I am Lucy... As the Pike Queen, I live and
breathe Pokémon battles.
pvoice_ch0240_00_musashi/system001:
I’m Jessie! Team Rocket, blast off at the
speed of light!
pvoice_ch0091_01_shirona/system001:
This outfit is a symbol of my determination.
It’s time to show the world why I’m proud to
be a Champion!
pvoice_ch0194_00_akagi/system001:
My name is Cyrus. I will create a new
world—a world without strife.
pvoice_ch0241_00_kojiro/system001:
I’m James of Team Rocket! Surrender now,
or prepare to fight!
pvoice_ch0090_40_daigo/system001:
I’m Steven. When the weather gets this hot,
I get fired up to take on new challenges.
pvoice_ch0002_40_kotone/system001:
Hi, I’m Lyra! Are you up for an adventure
today? I’m ready to soak up some sunshine!
pvoice_ch0118_00_lillie/system001:
Nice to meet you! My name’s Lillie.
I’ll show you my full power!
pvoice_ch0119_00_gladion/system001:
Call me Gladion. I like Pokémon battling
because it doesn’t matter if you’re a kid or
an adult. Everyone’s equal here!
pvoice_ch0120_00_lusamine/system001:
I am the president of the Aether Foundation.
But please, call me Lusamine. I’m so glad
we got to meet.
pvoice_ch0021_01_green/system001:
Bonjour! The name’s Blue! Feast your eyes
on the future PML Champion!
pvoice_ch0017_10_leaf/system001:
Hi, I’m Leaf! Let’s have a battle to see if you
love Pokémon as much as I do!
pvoice_ch0183_00_molayne/system001:
Well, hi there. I’m Molayne, a member of
the Alola Elite Four. I can’t wait to see
you grow.
pvoice_ch0007_40_acerola/system001:
Fight or fright! I’m Acerola, and I’m bringing
an old royal touch to Pasio!
pvoice_ch0020_40_toya/system001:
GRAAAWR! I’m Hilbert! Let’s team up in
battle and really get our blood pumping!
pvoice_ch0115_00_denji/system001:
I’m Volkner. As a Pokémon Trainer, I want
to have battles that can thrill me more
than anything!
pvoice_ch0007_00_acerola/system011:
Hiya! It’s me again, Acerola! I’m still here to
battle, whenever you need me!
pvoice_ch0020_00_toya/system011:
When we team up, no one can stop us! 
Let’s give it our best—together!
pvoice_ch0100_00_kyohei/system001:
Hey there! I’m Nate! If it’s OK with you, let’s
team up!
pvoice_ch0102_00_bell/system001:
Hey there! My name’s Bianca. Nice to meet
you! Oh! I’m from Unova, by the way.
I hope we can be friends!
pvoice_ch0215_00_lutia/system001:
Dazzling, dizzying, doldrums defying!
It’s me, Lisia! The miraculous contest idol
from Hoenn!
pvoice_ch0243_00_yuri/system001:
Hullo! I’m Gloria! I’m from a small town in
Galar called Postwick! Pleased to meetcha!
pvoice_ch0016_00_huuro/system011:
Aha, we meet again! When we’re together,
the sky’s the limit!
pvoice_ch0008_00_erika/system011:
How lovely to see you again. I do hope we
get to know each other better.
pvoice_ch0089_00_n/system001:
My name is N. I will show you that my love
for my friends permeates every cell of my
body. Behold!
pvoice_ch0126_00_haruka/system001:
I’m May! My dream is to become friends
with Pokémon all over the world! Nice to
meet you!
pvoice_ch0118_00_lillie/system011:
I’ll do my best so that no Pokémon have to
end up getting hurt!
pvoice_ch0111_00_wataru/system011:
Allow me to lend you my strength, whenever
you should need it. It’s time to move!
pvoice_ch0124_00_mao/system001:
Hey! Thanks for stopping by! I’m Mallow,
one of Alola’s captains!
pvoice_ch0132_00_adeku/system001:
My name is Alder! One of my goals is to tell
people about how wonderful the future with
Pokémon is!
pvoice_ch0196_00_fleurdelis/system001:
I am Lysandre. Let’s see what potential you
have hidden within you.
pvoice_ch0256_00_nezz/system001:
I’m Piers, the Gym Leader of Spikemuth! I 
make dark music and use Dark-type 
Pokémon! It’s time to rock!
pvoice_ch0130_00_serena/system011:
I knew we’d run into each other again!
I feel like the friendship we have with our
Pokémon connects us.
pvoice_ch0116_00_hikari/system011:
Need some help on your next big
adventure? I’m your gal! Come on,
let’s do some exploring!
pvoice_ch0158_00_carnet/system001:
I’m Diantha. If my life were a movie, I’d
play the role of a famous Pokémon
Trainer / actress.
pvoice_ch0092_80_iris/system001:
It’s me, Iris, Champion of the Unova Pokémon
League! I’ll help you take on any challenge!
pvoice_ch0245_00_mary/system001:
I’m Marnie from Spikemuth. Guess you an’
me are gonna be seein’ a lot more of each
other from now on, huh?
pvoice_ch0247_00_dande/system001:
I’m the Galar region’s greatest-ever
Pokémon Champion. People call me the
unbeatable Leon!
pvoice_ch0136_00_platane/system001:
I’m Professor Sycamore! It’s a pleasure to
finally meet you! How is your Pokémon
journey going so far?
pvoice_ch0122_00_yo/system001:
Alola! My name’s Elio. Looking forward to
spending some time exploring Pasio together!
pvoice_ch0123_00_mizuki/system001:
Alola! I’m Selene, and I’d love to go
exploring with you! In fact, let’s go
right now!
pvoice_ch0126_00_haruka/system011:
*giggle* It’s nice to see you again!
Let’s keep up the good work!
pvoice_ch0170_00_arty/system011:
No matter how many times we meet,
I always discover something new about you.
It certainly keeps things interesting!
pvoice_ch0249_00_rulina/system001:
My name’s Nessa. I’m the Gym Leader of
Hulbury over in Galar. Pleased to meet you!
pvoice_ch0250_00_saida/system001:
I’m Bea, a Gym Leader specializing in
Fighting-type Pokémon. Show me what
you’ve got in a quick bout.
pvoice_ch0257_00_qibana/system001:
Hey there! I’m Raihan, a Gym Leader from
Galar. C’mon, let’s take a selfie together to
remember this moment!
pvoice_ch0195_00_ghetsis/system001:
My name is Ghetsis, representative
of Team Plasma and liberator of
Pokémon everywhere.
pvoice_ch0117_00_royalmask/system001:
I’m here today to spread the word about
Battle Royal! They call me...the Masked
Royal! Woo!
pvoice_ch0192_00_matsubusa/system001:
I’m Maxie. I stand at the head of Team
Magma to propel humanity to greater heights
of progress and evolution.
pvoice_ch0193_00_aogiri/system001:
The name’s Archie. I’m the leader of Team
Aqua. I will return everything to its
unspoiled beginnings!
pvoice_ch0161_00_hara/system001:
I’m glad to meet you, child. I am Hala, an
Island Kahuna from Alola!
pvoice_ch0160_00_suiren/system001:
Hello. I’m Lana. I serve as the captain of
Brooklet Hill.
pvoice_ch0149_00_kaki/system001:
The name’s Kiawe. I’m a student of the
ancient dances that have been passed down
in Alola for generations.
pvoice_ch0035_00_matthies/system011:
I’ll zap our enemies with my Electric-type
Pokémon! Come on. Let’s move out!
pvoice_ch0148_00_matsuba/system011:
Hey, we meet again.
I sense a strong connection with you.
Here’s to more adventures together.
pvoice_ch0062_00_karin/system011:
Me? Team up with you? 
I suppose that could be interesting.
pvoice_ch0129_00_higana/system011:
This can’t just be coincidence...
I was just thinking about you!
pvoice_ch0108_00_nobori/system001:
I’m the Subway Boss Ingo! Pleasure to meet
you. Now then, all aboard!
pvoice_ch0109_00_kudari/system001:
I am Emmet. I am a Subway Boss.
Follow the rules. Safe driving!
pvoice_ch0243_40_yuri/system001:
Do you like my new outfit? I felt like
wearing something a little more beachy for
a change!
pvoice_ch0245_40_mary/system001:
I’m Marnie, and I’m feelin’ right sunny this
summer! Let’s power through this
heat together!
pvoice_ch0045_00_tsukushi/system011: There’s still so much to research!
pvoice_ch0066_01_boss/system001:
I’m Lear, creator of Pasio and the PML. I’m
going to be a king who cares about
his subjects!
pvoice_ch0067_01_leader1/system001:
Oh, hey. I’m Rachel. My job’s to, like, do
stuff for Master Lear. Sooo, yeah!
pvoice_ch0068_01_leader2/system001:
The name’s Sawyer. I’m asking for your
support—for the sake of Pasio, the PML,
and our young master!
pvoice_ch0135_00_kagetsu/system001:
I’m Sidney, one of the Hoenn Elite Four.
Think you’re tough enough to give me
a challenge?
pvoice_ch0150_00_hayato/system001:
I’m Falkner, the Violet City Pokémon Gym
Leader! I’ll show you the real power of the
magnificent bird Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0205_00_lesoir/system001:
Umm... My name is Evelyn... I’m a Battle
Chatelaine like my sisters.
pvoice_ch0244_00_hop/system001:
It’s me, Hop! It’s time for my new legend to
begin here with my partner Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0247_10_dande/system001:
I’ll always be around to make sure we have
a champion time! I won’t let anybody down!
pvoice_ch0089_40_n/system001:
My name is N. We should celebrate this
special day that brought us together.
pvoice_ch0118_50_lillie/system001:
Alola! I’m Lillie! Let’s make a bunch of
memories to celebrate this special day!
pvoice_ch0090_50_daigo/system001:
I’ll continue challenging myself and show you
my true power as the Champion of Hoenn!
pvoice_ch0110_01_kasumi/system011:
If you have a question about something,
you can always ask me, OK? That’s what
friends are for!
pvoice_ch0021_00_green/system011:
Come on! As long as you’re with me,
we can handle anybody who comes
our way!
pvoice_ch0110_10_kasumi/system001:
I’m Misty, the tomboyish mermaid! Let’s get
together and pummel through our rivals with
an all-out offensive!
pvoice_ch0008_10_erika/system001:
My name is Erika. Would you like to have a
Pokémon battle with me?
pvoice_ch0159_00_kokuran/system001:
Greetings. My name is Darach. I’ve long
had the honor of serving as Castle Valet
of the Battle Frontier.
pvoice_ch0148_40_matsuba/system001:
My name’s Morty. Would you like to join me
in the Midnight Parade?
pvoice_ch0095_40_cattleya/system001:
It’s me, Caitlin. *giggle*
Something tells me we’re about to embark
on an enchanting journey together.
pvoice_ch0125_00_guzma/system011:
There’s not enough destruction! Ergh!
C’mon, kid! It’s time to smash!
pvoice_ch0158_00_carnet/system011:
I can’t wait to see what you and your
Pokémon are capable of now!
pvoice_ch0113_00_mikan/system011:
I hope we keep battling together so we can
become even better friends!
pvoice_ch0004_00_toko/system011:
Team battles with you are fun! Can’t wait to
keep working with ya!
pvoice_ch0048_00_gima/system011:
Lots of things make me happy, but I don’t let
my emotions show.
pvoice_ch0259_00_sania/system001:
Hey there! I’m Sonia. I’ve been on a journey
to solve the Galar region’s biggest mysteries!
pvoice_ch0106_80_kamitsure/system001:
Want a battle that’ll shock you through and
through? I think I can help with that.
pvoice_ch0249_40_rulina/system001:
I’m Nessa. Let’s enjoy this time together and
claim ourselves a victory.
pvoice_ch0247_40_dande/system001:
I’m Leon, the Champion of Galar! What a
wonderful gift it is to see you today!
pvoice_ch0120_10_lusamine/system001:
My name is Lusamine. I will light your way
with beams of sunlight.
pvoice_ch0091_20_shirona/system001:
I’m Cynthia. Would you be interested in
investigating some Pokémon myths together?
pvoice_ch0162_00_koki/system001:
Hiya, I’m Lucas! I’m Professor Rowan’s
assistant in Sinnoh! Here’s hoping we have
tons of fun!
pvoice_ch0114_40_natsume/system001:
My name is Sabrina. I sense a new
beginning... It’s emanating a bright light.
pvoice_ch0115_40_denji/system001:
I’m Volkner. You and I should get together
and have an electrifying new start with
a battle!
pvoice_ch0245_41_mary/system001:
It’s me, Marnie. Have you noticed that
sweet, sugary scent all over town? Almost
makes me wanna smile.
pvoice_ch0250_40_saida/system001:
I’m Bea. I love Pokémon battles! And...I’m
also quite fond of sweets, too.
pvoice_ch0116_10_hikari/system001:
I’m Dawn, the hero who’ll protect everyone’s
hopes and dreams!
pvoice_ch0194_10_akagi/system001:
My name is Cyrus. I will create a perfect
world devoid of useless emotions.
pvoice_ch0130_40_serena/system001:
I’m Serena! I may love chocolate, but I’m
anything but sweet on the battlefield!
pvoice_ch0116_40_hikari/system001:
Hi, I’m Dawn! Wanna learn how to make
some sweets? I can teach you!
pvoice_ch0016_41_huuro/system001:
I’m Skyla! I’m so excited for today—I just
can’t wait to get out and do something fun!
pvoice_ch0126_41_haruka/system001:
It’s me, May! Any day I can make a
friend as awesome as you is a day
worth celebrating!
pvoice_ch0257_40_qibana/system001:
I’m Raihan. You’re never gonna forget
meeting a guy like me as long as you live!
pvoice_ch0130_10_serena/system001:
I’m Serena, fashion-lover and protector of
the peace and order of all Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0259_00_sania/system011:
Hey, I know you! Want to help me solve
some of Pasio’s mystifying
mysteries sometime?
pvoice_ch0108_00_nobori/system011:
Bravo! What a pleasure it is to see your face
again, young Trainer!
pvoice_ch0109_00_kudari/system011:
So, we meet again. Link with me to form a
two-car train, and full speed ahead!
pvoice_ch0126_40_haruka/system001:
I’m May! I’ve got cute, fluffy ears and a
bounce in my step, just like my
partner Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0170_40_arty/system001:
I’m Burgh! Do you like my new outfit? It’s
bound to make any event a pure delight!
pvoice_ch0148_10_matsuba/system001:
My name’s Morty. Care to see the results of
my secret training?
pvoice_ch0140_10_sakaki/system001:
I am Giovanni, leader of Team Rocket.
One day, the entire world will be under
my control.
pvoice_ch0152_00_ryo/system001:
Hello! I’m Aaron of the Sinnoh Elite Four.
It’s good to meet you!
pvoice_ch0154_00_kikuno/system001:
I’m Bertha, member of the Sinnoh
Elite Four. I have a preference for
Ground-type Pokémon.
pvoice_ch0176_00_goyo/system001:
I’m Lucian, a Psychic-type user. I’ll have to
go all out against you to live up to
my reputation.
pvoice_ch0246_00_beet/system001:
I’m Bede. You’d better remember me—I’m
the most elite Trainer of them all.
pvoice_ch0002_10_kotone/system001:
Hi, I’m Lyra! It’s really nice to meet you.
I’m so happy, I could dance!
pvoice_ch0112_10_hibiki/system001:
I’m Ethan! No one can beat my partner and
me when it comes to epic Pokémon battles!
pvoice_ch0018_10_chris/system001:
Nice to meet you! My name’s Kris, and I’m
on a journey to learn more about Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0089_41_n/system001:
My name is N. It’s quite an exciting day,
isn’t it? I can’t wait to enjoy it with you.
pvoice_ch0004_41_toko/system001:
Hi, I’m Hilda! Festivals are all about having
fun. Let’s get out there and have a blast!
pvoice_ch0012_10_corni/system001:
Time for Lady Korrina’s big appearance!
Together, we can aim even higher!
pvoice_ch0243_80_yuri/system001:
I’m Gloria! My Pokémon and I are always
eager to train, no matter what time it is!
pvoice_ch0019_10_yuki/system001:
I’m Brendan. If you ever need help, give me
a call! I’m your guy!
pvoice_ch0126_10_haruka/system001:
I’m May! Let’s team up and show everyone
some blazing-hot Pokémon battles!
pvoice_ch0217_00_handsome/system001:
I’m a globe-trotting elite of the International
Police. My code name is Looker.
pvoice_ch0222_00_kagari/system001:
I...am Courtney. You. Target
lock...completed. Aha... ♪
pvoice_ch0090_10_daigo/system001:
I’m Steven. I travel the world in search of
undiscovered lands and unknown possibilities.
pvoice_ch0140_00_sakaki/system011:
My wicked scheme is far from over.
Stick around. You’ll see...
pvoice_ch0091_10_shirona/system001:
I’m Cynthia. I always strive to get stronger
and better, both in battle and in my heart.
pvoice_ch0264_00_satoshi/system001:
I’m Ash from Pallet Town, and this is my
buddy, Pikachu. My dream is to become
a Pokémon Master!
pvoice_ch0204_00_lanuit/system001:
Hello! How are ya? I’m Nita, youngest o’ the
four Battle Chatelaine sisters! Pleasure to
meet ya!
pvoice_ch0531_70_sightseerf/system001:
Tagging along with you looks like it’ll be lots
of fun! You don’t mind, do you?
pvoice_ch0131_00_citron/system011:
Oh! I’m glad that we got to meet again
like this!
pvoice_ch0025_00_suzuna/system011:
Yes! I’m gonna stay focused and keep giving
it my all!
pvoice_ch0060_00_anzu/system011:
Janine on the scene! I’m still learning,
but I’ll back you up with my ninja techniques!
pvoice_ch0036_00_mamane/system011:
I wanna get stronger together, as a team!
And work harder! Harder than ever!
pvoice_ch0133_00_shilver/system011:
Oh, it’s you. Whatever...
We’ll show you how strong we are!
pvoice_ch0091_00_shirona/system011:
Together, I feel like we can unravel
mythology’s greatest mysteries! Let’s give it
our all.
pvoice_ch0089_00_n/system011:
I’ll become the bridge between Pokémon
and humans!
pvoice_ch0136_00_platane/system011:
Let’s get out there, meet all sorts of
people and Pokémon, and fill our lives with
rich experiences!
pvoice_ch0245_00_mary/system011:
Fancy seein’ you again. Looks like my
Pokémon’s warmed up to ya quite a bit.
pvoice_ch0128_10_mitsuru/system001:
I’m Wally. With my new outlook and
sygna suit, I’ll keep pushing myself to
greater heights!
pvoice_ch0242_00_masaru/system001:
Hello! I’m Victor, and I’m from the Galar
region. I’m pretty confident when it comes
to cooking!
pvoice_ch0092_40_iris/system001: Hi there! I’m Iris, and I’m here for my candy!
pvoice_ch0251_40_onion/system001:
’M Allister. L-looks like tonight’s gonna be
loads of fun!
pvoice_ch0254_00_gordie/system001:
The name’s Gordie. Our battles are bound to
get the crowd going!
pvoice_ch0255_00_melon/system001:
I’m Melony. I’ll show you what a severe
battle truly is.
pvoice_ch0521_60_hexmaniac/system001:
I’m a hex maniac... And I’ve known the two
of us would meet since my previous life...
pvoice_ch0020_10_toya/system001:
Hey there! I’m Hilbert, and I’m looking
forward to battling with you!
pvoice_ch0004_10_toko/system001:
Hi, I’m Hilda! No matter what kind of battle
we’re heading into, I’m always ready
to win!
pvoice_ch0089_10_n/system001:
My name is N. I’m on a journey to find the
truth and ideals that Pokémon and humans
can achieve together.
pvoice_ch0106_00_kamitsure/system011:
Fancy meeting you again. Come on...
I think it’s time for us to bathe in
the spotlight.
pvoice_ch0162_00_koki/system011:
How’re you coming along? Me? I always try
to be at the top of my game.
You know...when I can.
pvoice_ch0018_00_chris/system011:
Knowing the ins and outs of Pokémon is the
true path to winning battles!
pvoice_ch0002_00_kotone/system011:
I’m not sure what the future holds, but we’ll
have fun no matter what!
pvoice_ch0191_00_achroma/system001:
My name is Colress, and I am a scientist.
The theme of my research is, “Bringing out
the potential of Pokémon.”
pvoice_ch0147_00_hugh/system001:
I’m Hugh. Pokémon should be protected...
and I’m willing to fight for all of them!
pvoice_ch0257_00_qibana/system011:
Hey, gimme a shout if you’re ever in trouble,
all right? I’ve got your back!
pvoice_ch0130_90_serena/system001:
My name’s Serena. I’m gonna be the world’s
best Trainer in both Pokémon battles
and fashion!
pvoice_ch0003_90_calme/system001:
My name’s Calem. I’m gonna be the top
Trainer in Kalos one day!
pvoice_ch0026_40_akane/system001:
Hi there! It’s me, the ever-cheerful Whitney!
I bet my cute outfit’s got you feelin’ pretty
infatuated, right?
pvoice_ch0113_41_mikan/system001:
I’m Jasmine. I hope I can make everyone
happy by lighting up the whole town!
pvoice_ch0101_10_meix/system001:
I’m Rosa! My present to you will be all the
fun we’ll have battling together!
pvoice_ch0096_10_zumix/system001:
I’m Siebold, and I’m very much looking
forward to a night full of exceptional treats
and battles.
pvoice_ch0016_40_huuro/system001:
I’m Skyla! My job is to deliver smiles and joy
to everyone I see!
pvoice_ch0008_40_erika/system001:
My name is Erika. I’ve brought many
wreaths with me today! Would you like
to help me decorate?
pvoice_ch0139_00_sana/system001:
Hi, I’m Shauna! I came here from
the Kalos region! Let’s make some
fun memories together! ♪
pvoice_ch0215_40_lutia/system001:
It’s me, contest idol Lisia! It’s gotta be some
sort of fate that brought us together like this!
pvoice_ch0116_41_hikari/system001:
Hi, I’m Dawn! I’ve got a brand-new outfit
and a fresh new outlook to go with it!
pvoice_ch0158_10_carnet/system001:
I am Diantha. Allow me to show you how I
shine, living up to the title of Champion!
pvoice_ch0610_60_furisodegirl/system001:
Nice to meet you. In a Pokémon battle, I’m
both strong AND stylish!
pvoice_ch0196_10_fleurdelis/system001:
I am Lysandre. I desire a more
beautiful world.
pvoice_ch0124_40_mao/system001:
Hey there! Thanks for stopping by! If you’re
looking for someone to whip up some sweet
treats, leave it to me—Mallow!
pvoice_ch0106_40_kamitsure/system001:
I’m Elesa. I’ll show you a sweet battle that’ll
melt your heart!
pvoice_ch0178_00_lira/system001:
It’s an honor to meet you. My name is
Anabel. I’m the head of a secret division of
the International Police.
pvoice_ch0220_00_matiere/system001: Oh, me? I’m Emma. Nice to meet you! ♪
pvoice_ch0118_40_lillie/system001:
New outfit, new me! I’m ready to go
all out—even more than before!
pvoice_ch0111_40_wataru/system001:
I feel lucky to meet you! I’m sure we’ll make
a great team!
pvoice_ch0245_90_mary/system001:
It’s me, Marnie. I’ll do my best for the
people who cheer for me!
pvoice_ch0244_90_hop/system001:
I’m Hop, and I’m gonna be the strongest
Pokémon Professor in the world!
pvoice_ch0246_90_beet/system001:
It’s me, Bede. I will reign as the top Trainer
in the world.
pvoice_ch0282_00_ballguy/system001:
Ta-da! Look who just rolled up—it’s your
pal, Ball Guy!
pvoice_ch0243_00_yuri/system011:
Whether it’s Pokémon battles or setting up
camp, I’ve got you covered! Now then,
onward to adventure!
pvoice_ch0139_00_sana/system011:
Hey there! Looks like we meet again! ♪
Let’s take this opportunity to make some
bright and sparkling memories! ♪
pvoice_ch0090_00_daigo/system011:
Let’s walk this world on our own two
feet...see it with our own eyes, and feel it in
our hearts.
pvoice_ch0005_00_kanna/system011:
Cool as ice but with a burning passion.
Let’s make sure our Pokémon battles
have both!
pvoice_ch0057_00_shiba/system011:
Through rigorous training, people and
Pokémon can become infinitely stronger! 
Believe in your potential!
pvoice_ch0098_10_hau/system001:
Yeah, I’m Hau! I just can’t wait to have an
all-out battle with you!
pvoice_ch0034_10_matsurika/system001:
I’m Mina! As a token of our acquaintance,
I’ll draw a portrait of you!
pvoice_ch0007_10_acerola/system001:
Hiya, Acerola here! I’ll teach any bad kids
who don’t care about the environment
a lesson!
pvoice_ch0160_10_suiren/system001:
Hello. I’m Lana. You look like you’re well
worth catching.
pvoice_ch0061_00_kikuko/system011:
I’m Agatha, of the Indigo Elite Four!
Let’s see what you can do, child!
pvoice_ch0284_00_seki/system001:
I’m Adaman, leader of the Diamond Clan, if
you want to be formal! But that’s a mouthful.
Just call me Adaman.
pvoice_ch0285_00_kai/system001:
I’m Irida, leader of the Pearl Clan! Caution
and foresight are my watchwords.
pvoice_ch0216_00_minaki/system001:
My name is Eusine. I’m a Trainer on the trail
of the Pokémon of my dreams.
pvoice_ch0133_10_shilver/system001:
I’m Silver. I’m going to be the world’s
greatest Trainer...with my Pokémon at
my side.
pvoice_ch0284_00_seki/system011:
Hey! I’ll cut the greetings! We don’t have
any more time to waste!
pvoice_ch0031_40_fuu/system001:
I’m Tate! I wished upon a star that I could
be good friends with you!
pvoice_ch0030_40_ran/system001:
I’m Liza! The stars have guided me to you...
Maybe!
pvoice_ch0262_00_rose/system001:
It’s a delight to meet you. My name is Rose.
It’s an honor to be here!
pvoice_ch0263_00_olea/system001:
My name is Oleana. I have devoted myself
to working as Chairman Rose’s secretary.
pvoice_ch0285_00_kai/system011:
When you know your destination,
no hesitation... And I didn’t hesitate!
pvoice_ch0149_00_kaki/system011: Would you like to burn in battle with me?
pvoice_ch0124_00_mao/system011:
Hey! Thanks for stopping by again! When it
comes to you and your Pokémon, the quality
of the ingredients really does shine!
pvoice_ch0247_80_dande/system001:
I’m Leon from Galar! I’ll take on any
opponent with everything I’ve got!
pvoice_ch0243_81_yuri/system001:
I’m Gloria, a passionate challenger who
won’t give up, no matter what I’m
up against!
pvoice_ch0289_00_nemo/system001:
I’m Nemona! I absolutely love Pokémon
battling! Nice to meet you!
pvoice_ch0175_00_gojika/system001:
So the stars decree. Gym Leader Olympia
shall fight by your side.
pvoice_ch0003_00_calme/system011:
Teaming up with you seems to be the
quickest path to getting stronger.
Let’s stick together.
pvoice_ch0242_00_masaru/system011:
Nice to see you again! I’ve just finished
cooking something tasty... Would you like to
have some with me?
pvoice_ch0021_90_green/system001:
Hey, I’m Blue! I’m one of the most talented,
top-level Trainers to come out of Kanto!
pvoice_ch0017_90_leaf/system001:
I’m Leaf! Let’s burn bright with our love
for Pokémon!
pvoice_ch0134_00_kurotsugu/system001:
Hi! I’m Palmer, the Tower Tycoon! You can
find me in the Battle Tower, waiting for
spectacular Trainers to challenge me!
pvoice_ch0203_00_kate/system001:
I am Argenta. I’m a Hall Matron who shines
while doing the things I truly love.
pvoice_ch0064_01_rival/system001:
I’m Paulo. I finally know what path I should
take, so I’m starting over again as a Trainer.
pvoice_ch0105_01_rival2/system001:
I’m Tina! When it comes to caring for
Pokémon, I won’t lose to anyone!
pvoice_ch0141_00_apollo/system001:
I’m Archer, a Team Rocket executive.
Here on Pasio, we are going to regain our
former glory!
pvoice_ch0142_00_athena/system001:
I am Ariana, an executive of Team Rocket.
Allow me to show you just how strong and
magnificent Team Rocket really is!
pvoice_ch0143_00_lambda/system001:
Muhahaha, I’ve been waiting for you. I am
Petrel, a Team Rocket executive!
pvoice_ch0144_00_lance/system001:
I’m Proton, the scariest and cruelest Team
Rocket executive... Do not interfere with
our business.
pvoice_ch0206_00_lajournee/system001:
My name is Dana. I am the second eldest of
the four Battle Chatelaine sisters!
pvoice_ch0017_00_leaf/system011:
No one loves Pokémon more than I do! I put
my heart and soul into every single battle!
pvoice_ch0150_00_hayato/system011:
As long as we have lofty ambitions, we can
fly as far as we want! Let’s keep aiming
high together!
pvoice_ch0099_00_jun/system011: You and me—we should be friends!
pvoice_ch0157_00_mache/system011:
Oh, if it isn’t my young Trainer friend...
We seem to keep meeting like this,
don’t we?
pvoice_ch0051_00_litchi/system011:
You guys are the best! I can’t wait to go on
even more adventures together.
pvoice_ch0291_00_sho/system001:
Hi! I’m Akari, from the Hisui region. I’m a
member of the Galaxy Team’s Survey Corps!
Nice to meet you!
pvoice_ch0290_00_teru/system001:
I’m Rei, a member of the Galaxy Team’s
Survey Corps—for now!
pvoice_ch0049_40_fuyo/system001:
Ahahaha! I’m Phoebe. I’ll bring you along for
a fun evening with all my friends!
pvoice_ch0044_40_tsutsuji/system001:
Hello! I’m Roxanne. Let’s have some
fun tonight!
pvoice_ch0169_00_aloe/system001:
I’m Lenora, the director of the Nacrene
Museum in Unova!
pvoice_ch0041_00_nejiki/system011:
Bzweeeeep! Sorry, don’t mind me. Just know
that teaming up with me is always a
good idea.
pvoice_ch0046_00_datsura/system011:
You’re sticking with me, right? We’re going
straight to the top!
pvoice_ch0269_00_ayumi/system001:
Nice to meet you! My name’s Elaine, and I’m
from Pallet Town!
pvoice_ch0293_00_button/system001:
Ah, um, I’m Penny. I’m great with machines
and hacking and stuff, so...nice to meet you.
pvoice_ch0011_10_homika/system001:
Hey, I’m Roxie! I always keep the beat
going, in battle AND in music!
pvoice_ch0256_10_nezz/system001:
I’m Piers! I’m gonna sing a song to celebrate
our encounter!
pvoice_ch0190_00_ryuki/system001:
The name’s Ryuki. I’m what you might call
a star. I came all the way across the sea to
spread my fame out here, too!
pvoice_ch0122_00_yo/system011:
Alola again! Can’t wait to see what else
Pasio has in store for us. Together, we can
take on anything!
pvoice_ch0123_00_mizuki/system011:
Alola, alola! Isn’t that a fun word to say?
C’mon, say it with me!
pvoice_ch0654_00_pokekidf/system001: OK, now I say, “A wild Poké Kid appeared!”
pvoice_ch0119_00_gladion/system011:
As you get stronger, I will, too. No way I’m
getting left behind!
pvoice_ch0100_90_kyohei/system001:
The name’s Nate! Let’s battle together and
make it look cool!
pvoice_ch0101_90_mei/system001:
I’m Rosa! Let me show off my magnificent
dance moves and singing voice!
pvoice_ch0136_40_platane/system001:
Hi there! My name’s Sycamore! I’m so
grateful I was able to meet you on this
special day. It feels just like a miracle!
pvoice_ch0039_40_viola/system001:
I’m Viola! You’re as charming as a winter
landscape—I’d love to snap a bunch of
pictures of you!
pvoice_ch0028_40_ibuki/system001:
I am Clair! You should feel honored to team
up with the world’s best dragon master!
pvoice_ch0127_40_mikuri/system001:
I am Wallace! Let me show you the glorious
art of fire!
pvoice_ch0294_00_grusha/system001:
My name’s Grusha. I’m a snowboarder.
Used to be pro, actually. Now I’m a
Gym Leader.
pvoice_ch0296_00_nanjamo/system001:
It’s me, Iono! I kick it as Gym Leader and
produce sweet content as an influencer to
bring dreams to the masses!
pvoice_ch0659_00_furisodegirl/system001:
What opponents are fairies good against,
and which are they weak against? I think
you know the answer...
pvoice_ch0119_10_gladion/system001:
My name is Gladion... Let me see how good
you are.
pvoice_ch0279_00_kakeru/system001:
Hi, I’m Chase from Pallet Town! Nice to
meet you!
pvoice_ch0242_40_masaru/system001:
Hello! I’m Victor, and I’m cooking up a new
dish! Can you give it a taste test?
pvoice_ch0025_40_suzuna/system001:
Hiya, I’m Candice! Pokémon, fashion,
romance—it’s all about focus!
pvoice_ch0655_00_pokekidm/system001:
I’m a Pikachu! When I grow up, I’m gonna
be a Raichu!
pvoice_ch0156_00_gen/system001:
I’m Riley. I’m a Trainer, and yes, it is a bit
odd that I’m always training in mines.
pvoice_ch0115_00_denji/system011: Let’s make some sparks fly on this adventure!
pvoice_ch0128_00_mitsuru/system011:
I-I bet I’m even stronger than the last time
you saw me! Let’s go find a battle—I’ll
show you!
pvoice_ch0295_00_omodaka/system001:
I am Geeta, chairwoman of the Pokémon
League in Paldea.
pvoice_ch0133_90_shilver/system001:
I’m Silver. I’m going to surpass every Trainer
to be the best in the world.
pvoice_ch0202_00_dahlia/system001:
I’m Dahlia, the Arcade Star. I wish to find
out who has more luck—you or me!
pvoice_ch0180_00_tierno/system001:
Nice to meetcha! I’m Tierno. Coming up with
the world’s best Pokémon dance is
my dream!
pvoice_ch0297_00_volo/system001:
I’m Volo of the Ginkgo Guild, the go-to
choice for your mercantile needs!
pvoice_ch0298_00_zinnia/system001:
Hello, hello. My name’s Jacq. It’s a pleasure
to meet you!
pvoice_ch0297_00_volo/system011:
Fancy running into you again! Maybe we’ll
get to know each other better now!
pvoice_ch0300_00_jujube/system001:
I’m the queen of the Land of Enchantment.
My name is Bellelba!
pvoice_ch0301_00_hachikuman/system001:
Mwahaha! I am Brycen-Man, the Masked
Man who wanders through reality
and phantasm!
pvoice_ch0302_00_chiri/system001:
Hey hey! Rika here, at your service! I know
I’m pretty, but no need to get intimidated
or anything.
pvoice_ch0303_00_poppy/system001:
I’m Poppy! I’m one of the Elite Four, so
I’m amazing!
pvoice_ch0121_00_plumeria/system011:
Helping others isn’t usually my style, but if
you can prove you’ve got guts, I might make
an exception.
pvoice_ch0302_00_chiri/system011:
We run into each other a lot, huh? I hear
you’ve been super successful!
